snippet: Rafael Nadal kept making a stand, kept coming back, kept showing he would not depart quietly from this U.S. Open. Facing a much younger, much-less-accomplished opponent, Nadal twice erased a set deficit. Then he staved off a trio of match points....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal kept making a stand, kept coming back, kept showing he would not depart quietly from this U.S. Open. Facing a much younger, much-less-accomplished opponent, Nadal twice erased a set deficit. Then he staved off a trio of match points.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Falters Late, Falls to Pouille in US Open Fourth Round
headline.main: Nadal Falters Late, Falls to Pouille in US Open Fourth Round
